name: FinishYourRace
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Uplifting conversations with extraordinary individuals who share their personal stories of triumph, hope and transformation in the face of adversity, and offer strategies to help you best finish your race. Don Armstrong is author of Finish YOUR Race, a chronicle of his cancer journey which transformed the course of his life. Since his healing, he has found purpose in teaching individuals and organizations to finish their race in all areas of life.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
